headline: Is It Too Late to Consider IBM After Its 40% 2025 Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether International Business Machines is still a value play after its big run, or if the easy money has already been made, this breakdown will help you decide whether the current price makes sense. IBM has quietly turned into a strong performer, with the stock up 40.0% year to date and 32.7% over the last year, even though the last week and month have been relatively flat at around 0% moves. Those gains have come as investors have warmed up to IBM's pivot toward hybrid...
